REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires members of the metropolitan transportation authority police force to wear body cameras
Summary: Requires members of the metropolitan transportation authority police force to wear body cameras and for such camera to be on at all times during the officer's shift; directs the chief of the metropolitan transportation authority police force to promulgate rules and regulations pertaining to such body cameras.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266-h, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring members of the metropolitan transportation authority police force to wear body cameras
